strings: <voice_0x01000C99><se_def>Ishmahri: Oh, grieving soul. May the moon's rays trace the scenes enacted here long ago...

<voice_0x01000C9A><se_def>King Pavan: ...What is this?
A dream? An illusion? No...
No... I remember this...you...
<voice_0x01000C9B><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> ...is wrong...?
<voice_0x01000CA5><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> What is wrong?
<voice_0x01000CA6><se_def>King Pavan: ...Sasha!
<voice_0x01000CA7><se_def>King Pavan: I've missed you so! These two years, I've thought of nothing but you. Ever since you passed away...

<voice_0x01000CA8><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> You're not still fretting about
this morning's missive, are you? You mustn't.
You made the right decision.

<voice_0x01000CA9><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> You're always so lenient with
people. But sometimes you need to be firm too.
That's a king's duty.

<voice_0x01000CAA><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Everybody believes in you.
You must stand tall and proud.
Ascantha is your country.

<voice_0x01000CAB><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Oh yes! I have news!
The innkeeper's dog has had a puppy!
He wants us to think of a name!

<voice_0x01000CAC><se_def>King Pavan: Is that...me? Yes, I remember this.
It was the spring before last.
So this is a memory from the past?

<voice_0x01000CAD><se_def>King Pavan<:> A puppy, you say?
...What do you think? No doubt you've
already thought of a good name for it!
<voice_0x01000CAE><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> It's a secret.

<voice_0x01000CAF><se_def>King Pavan<:> Why? If you've thought of a name,
then I'm sure it's splendid. Tell me!

<voice_0x01000CB0><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Surely you have a suggestion too?
A name for this puppy?
<voice_0x01000CB1><se_def>King Pavan<:> But I'm sure yours<endash>

<voice_0x01000CB2><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Shush, now, Pavan. I think any
name you came up with would be simply perfect.

<voice_0x01000CB3><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> My dear King. You're a wise
and kind man. You should follow your
own instincts.

<voice_0x01000CB4><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> I was planning to use the name you
thought of. That's all I'd decided.

<voice_0x01000CB5><se_def>King Pavan: ...Ah, yes. She was always like that,
always giving me so much encouragement.

<voice_0x01000CB6><se_def>King Pavan: Sasha...
Why...

<voice_0x01000CB7><se_def>King Pavan<:> ...Sasha.
Why are you always so strong?

<voice_0x01000CB8><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Because my mother gives
me strength.

<voice_0x01000CB9><se_def>King Pavan<:> Your mother?
But she passed away years ago...
<voice_0x01000CBA><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> I never told you, but I was very timid as a child, so weak and afraid. And every day, my mother would try hard to encourage me.
<voice_0x01000CBB><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> When she died, I was so sad and lonely... But then I realised...
<voice_0x01000CBC><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> If I went back to my old weak self, I would have nothing left of my mother at all.

<voice_0x01000CBD><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> It would be just as if she had
never existed.

<voice_0x01000CBE><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> I realised I had to be strong.
That I must remember her words of encouragement and everything she taught me.
<voice_0x01000CBF><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> ...That way, she'll live on inside me for always. For ever...

<voice_0x01000CC0><se_def>King Pavan: Sasha.
You're right... I should be more like you...

<voice_0x01000CC1><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Shall we go out onto the terrace?
The weather's so nice today. It would be lovely
to enjoy the breeze together.

<voice_0x01000CC2><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> Look! Your country stretches
before us as far as the eye can see!
Oh! Ascantha is so beautiful!

<voice_0x01000CC3><se_def>King Pavan: ...Yes.
Beautiful, Sasha... So beautiful.

<voice_0x01000CC4><se_high>Queen Sasha<:> My darling King.
For people to live their lives happily...
you must be strong...
<voice_0x01000CC5><se_def>King Pavan: ...I remember. Everything you ever told me lives on inside my heart.

<voice_0x01000CC6><se_def>King Pavan: Forgive me, Sasha. ...I've finally opened my eyes.
I'm sorry for being so sad and lonely.
<voice_0x01000CC7><se_def>King Pavan: ...At last, I've finally awoken from my long and terrible nightmare.
